metadata.dc:description: Given the rareness of cervical schwannomas, they are often mistaken for other kinds of lesions. We present 2 clinical cases, make comments on the clinical-pathological features involved and point out the essential elements that ensure the differential diagnosis of these tumours.
metadata.dc:title: Schwannomas de cuello.
[Neck schwannomas].
